# Hey.xyz llms.txt Integration File

Hey is a decentralized, permissionless social media platform built on top of the Lens. It enables users to own their content, social graph, and identity on-chainâ€”completely free from the control of centralized platforms.

# Content Types

- User account: https://hey.xyz/u/{username}
- Post: https://hey.xyz/posts/{postSlug}
- Group: https://hey.xyz/g/{groupAddress}

Sitemap: https://hey.xyz/sitemap.xml
Accounts Sitemap: https://hey.xyz/sitemap/accounts.xml
